author: sky.cactus
content:
<@425279588009246720> https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3252
You are the author of the EIP being edited here and we would *really* like to get it updated ASAP because it is causing confusion.  Our rules are pretty clear that only the author can approve EIPs updates so I'm very hesitant to do anything about it without your approval, but it is quite a problem.

author: gcolvin
content:
Allow for HTML as well as markdown?  MD won't even do subscripts and superscripts, and has no intention of improving.  We had better tools in the '70s.  But I've whined about this many times before.

The empty headers look good enough to me, given that MD looks ugly anyway.
